STATE
v.
Donna Helms LEDBETTER 402PA15-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 15, 2018 Meghan Adelle Jones, Attorney at Law, for Ledbetter, Donna Helms. Ashleigh P. Dunston, Assistant Attorney General, Christopher W. Brooks, Special Deputy Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of October 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

*696"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of October 2018."
